description: Triangle T(n,k) of arctangent numbers: expansion of arctan(x)^n/n!.
references: L. Comtet, Advanced Combinatorics, Reidel, 1974, p. 260.
formula: E.g.f.: arctan(x)^k/k!=sum {n=0..inf} T(m, [ k+1 ]/2) x^m/m! where m=2n+k%2.
mathematica: t[n_, k_] := (-1)^((3*n+k)/2)*n!/2^k*Sum[2^i*Binomial[n-1, i-1]*StirlingS1[i, k]/i!, {i, k, n}]; Flatten[Table[t[n,k], {n,1,11}, {k, 2-Mod[n, 2], n, 2}]] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Aug 31 2011, after V. Kruchinin *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
